# 台湾大学林轩田机器学习笔记（红色石头）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/taiwandaxue-linxuan-tian-jiqi-xuexi-biji-hongse-shitou
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/taiwandaxue-linxuan-tian-jiqi-xuexi-biji-hongse-shitou
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install taiwandaxue-linxuan-tian-jiqi-xuexi-biji-hongse-shitou
taiwandaxue-linxuan-tian-jiqi-xuexi-biji-hongse-shitou <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g taiwandaxue-linxuan-tian-jiqi-xuexi-biji-hongse-shitou
taiwandaxue-linxuan-tian-jiqi-xuexi-biji-hongse-shitou <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
